prompts.name: summarize
prompts.text: Please provide a concise summary of the following text. Focus on the key points and main ideas. Keep it brief but comprehensive, capturing the essential information in a clear and organized way.

prompts.name: formal
prompts.text: Please rewrite the following text in a formal, professional tone. Use proper business language and structure. Ensure the tone is respectful, authoritative, and appropriate for professional communication.

prompts.name: casual
prompts.text: Please rewrite the following text in a casual, relaxed tone. Make it sound conversational and approachable. Use everyday language while maintaining clarity and keeping the core message intact.

prompts.name: friendly
prompts.text: Please rewrite the following text in a warm, friendly tone. Make it sound welcoming and personable. Add warmth and approachability while keeping the message clear and engaging.

prompts.name: polish
prompts.text: Please polish the following text by fixing any grammatical issues, typos, or awkward phrasing. Make it sound natural and human while keeping it direct and clear. Double-check that the tone is appropriate and not offensive, but maintain the original intent and directness.
